paragraphs.content: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Ephesians
paragraphs.contentHtml: <small>The Epistle of Paul the Apostle</small> <small>to the</small> Ephesians

paragraphs.content: Chapter 1
paragraphs.contentHtml: Chapter 1

paragraphs.content: Paul, an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God, to the saints which are at Ephesus, and to the faithful in Christ Jesus:
paragraphs.contentHtml: Paul, an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God, to the saints which are at Ephesus, and to the faithful in Christ Jesus:

paragraphs.content: Grace be to you, and peace, from God our Father, and from the Lord Jesus Christ.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Grace be to you, and peace, from God our Father, and from the Lord Jesus Christ.

paragraphs.content: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who hath blessed us with all spiritual blessings in heavenly places in Christ:
paragraphs.contentHtml: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who hath blessed us with all spiritual blessings in heavenly places in Christ:

paragraphs.content: According as he hath chosen us in him before the foundation of the world, that we should be holy and without blame before him in love:
paragraphs.contentHtml: According as he hath chosen us in him before the foundation of the world, that we should be holy and without blame before him in love:

paragraphs.content: Having predestinated us unto the adoption of children by Jesus Christ to himself, according to the good pleasure of his will,
paragraphs.contentHtml: Having predestinated us unto the adoption of children by Jesus Christ to himself, according to the good pleasure of his will,

paragraphs.content: To the praise of the glory of his grace, wherein he hath made us accepted in the beloved.
paragraphs.contentHtml: To the praise of the glory of his grace, wherein he hath made us accepted in the beloved.

paragraphs.content: In whom we have redemption through his blood, the forgiveness of sins, according to the riches of his grace;
paragraphs.contentHtml: In whom we have redemption through his blood, the forgiveness of sins, according to the riches of his grace;

paragraphs.content: Wherein he hath abounded toward us in all wisdom and prudence;
paragraphs.contentHtml: Wherein he hath abounded toward us in all wisdom and prudence;

paragraphs.content: Having made known unto us the mystery of his will, according to his good pleasure which he hath purposed in himself:
paragraphs.contentHtml: Having made known unto us the mystery of his will, according to his good pleasure which he hath purposed in himself:

paragraphs.content: That in the dispensation of the fulness of times he might gather together in one all things in Christ, both which are in heaven, and which are on earth; even in him:
paragraphs.contentHtml: That in the dispensation of the fulness of times he might gather together in one all things in Christ, both which are in heaven, and which are on earth; even in him:

paragraphs.content: In whom also we have obtained an inheritance, being predestinated according to the purpose of him who worketh all things after the counsel of his own will:
paragraphs.contentHtml: In whom also we have obtained an inheritance, being predestinated according to the purpose of him who worketh all things after the counsel of his own will:

paragraphs.content: That we should be to the praise of his glory, who first trusted in Christ.
paragraphs.contentHtml: That we should be to the praise of his glory, who first trusted in Christ.

paragraphs.content: In whom ye also trusted, after that ye heard the word of truth, the gospel of your salvation: in whom also after that ye believed, ye were sealed with that holy Spirit of promise,
paragraphs.contentHtml: In whom ye also trusted, after that ye heard the word of truth, the gospel of your salvation: in whom also after that ye believed, ye were sealed with that holy Spirit of promise,

paragraphs.content: Which is the earnest of our inheritance until the redemption of the purchased possession, unto the praise of his glory.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Which is the earnest of our inheritance until the redemption of the purchased possession, unto the praise of his glory.

paragraphs.content: Wherefore I also, after I heard of your faith in the Lord Jesus, and love unto all the saints,
paragraphs.contentHtml: Wherefore I also, after I heard of your faith in the Lord Jesus, and love unto all the saints,

paragraphs.content: Cease not to give thanks for you, making mention of you in my prayers;
paragraphs.contentHtml: Cease not to give thanks for you, making mention of you in my prayers;

paragraphs.content: That the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the Father of glory, may give unto you the spirit of wisdom and revelation in the knowledge of him:
paragraphs.contentHtml: That the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the Father of glory, may give unto you the spirit of wisdom and revelation in the knowledge of him:

paragraphs.content: The eyes of your understanding being enlightened; that ye may know what is the hope of his calling, and what the riches of the glory of his inheritance in the saints,
paragraphs.contentHtml: The eyes of your understanding being enlightened; that ye may know what is the hope of his calling, and what the riches of the glory of his inheritance in the saints,

paragraphs.content: And what is the exceeding greatness of his power to us-ward who believe, according to the working of his mighty power,
paragraphs.contentHtml: And what is the exceeding greatness of his power to us-ward who believe, according to the working of his mighty power,

paragraphs.content: Which he wrought in Christ, when he raised him from the dead, and set him at his own right hand in the heavenly places,
paragraphs.contentHtml: Which he wrought in Christ, when he raised him from the dead, and set him at his own right hand in the heavenly places,

paragraphs.content: Far above all principality, and power, and might, and dominion, and every name that is named, not only in this world, but also in that which is to come:
paragraphs.contentHtml: Far above all principality, and power, and might, and dominion, and every name that is named, not only in this world, but also in that which is to come:

paragraphs.content: And hath put all things under his feet, and gave him to be the head over all things to the church,
paragraphs.contentHtml: And hath put all things under his feet, and gave him to be the head over all things to the church,

paragraphs.content: Which is his body, the fulness of him that filleth all in all.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Which is his body, the fulness of him that filleth all in all.
